hanzi-su-wiki:
暁

Значения

Заря, рассвет; понимать, постигать

Мнемоника

Мавзолей императора Яо 堯, построенный так, чтобы всё время быть на солнце 日. Внизу — постамент и вход, выше — треугольная пирамида из глазурованных глиняных кирпичей. Постоянный свет.

Варианты

曉, 晓

Meaning Mnemonic
Gamblers usually only see the sun at dawn. They gamble all day and through the night, and if they leave it's at the crack of dawn to get home, clean up, and then go back. I haven't known a gambler who's seen the sun ... well ever!
Imagine being a gambler and seeing the bright dawn sun when you come out of the casino or pachinko parlor. It burns your eyes! Evil dawn, get back inside quick!
Reading Mnemonic
If you're up at dawn you'll also see the あか (red) つき (moon). The あかつき only happens as the sun comes up at dawn so usually only gamblers see it. But if you get up early, you can see it too!
Imagine getting up at dawn and seeing the あかつき in the sky near the sun. It's so beautiful!
